name.en: Generative AI and Programming Applications in Educational Data Mining
name.ch: 生成式AI與程式設計應用於教育資料探勘

department.ch: 網路學習科技研究所碩士班
department.en: Graduate Institute of Network Learning Technology

goal.ch:
[請自備筆電上課]
這門課旨在讓學生理解生成式AI與教育資料探勘的理論與實作，並學以致用，解決實際教育問題，實現學術與實務並進。
1.理解生成式AI的核心概念及應用於教育的可能性。
2.掌握Python基礎程式設計技能，進行教育資料的預處理與分析。
3.理解機器學習的基礎概念，並應用於教育資料探勘實務。
4.設計基於生成式AI的教育資料探勘的方案，提升教學成效。
goal.en:
[Please bring your laptop to this class]
1.Understand the core concepts of generative AI and its applications in education.
2.Acquire basic Python programming skills for educational data preprocessing and analysis.
3.Apply foundational machine learning concepts to educational data mining.
4.Design AI-driven educational applications to enhance teaching effectiveness and learning outcomes.

outline.ch:
週別主題學習目標教學活動與作業
1課程簡介與生成式AI概述認識生成式AI在教育的應用與潛力小組討論：生成式AI如何影響教學與學習
2程式設計基礎 (Python 入門) - I學習Python語法及基礎工具上機練習：撰寫基本數據處理程式
3程式設計基礎 (Python 入門) - II熟練數據讀取、操作及簡單運算實作：教育數據的簡易分析與輸出
4資料探勘基礎理解資料探勘的流程與教育應用教案設計：針對課堂數據的初步分析
5資料清洗與預處理掌握教育資料的清洗與整理技術上機實作：清洗一份學生學習行為數據
6生成式AI技術解析 (ChatGPT, DALL-E等)探討生成式AI技術的理論與實踐實驗活動：利用ChatGPT進行教學內容生成
7教育資料視覺化掌握視覺化工具進行資料呈現上機練習：用matplotlib繪製學生表現圖表
8中期報告檢視學習進度與初步成果展示簡報：教育AI應用的初步構想
9機器學習與學習資料分析相關議題探討機器學習模型在教育資料中的應用上機實作：使用基礎模型分析學習數據
10教育資料探勘技術 (行為模式分析)學習行為序列分析與應用實作練習：探討學生學習行為模式
11生成式AI應用在教學資料分析實作設計生成式AI應用於教育數據分析小組合作：設計生成式AI教學應用的原型
12實務專題工作坊 (1)整合技術與資料探勘成果小組合作：實現生成式AI教育應用
13實務專題工作坊 (2)完善專題設計並測試系統上機實作：調試生成式AI應用功能
14應用挑戰與未來展望探討生成式AI在教育中的挑戰與未來討論：生成式AI的倫理與政策考量
15業師演講或討論實體或線上參與產業或學術活動撰寫心得報告並分享學習成果
16期末報告與成果展示發表專題成果與反思學習經驗專題簡報與成果展示
outline.en:
WeekTopicLearning GoalsActivities and Assignments
1Course Introduction and Overview of Generative AIUnderstand the potential and applications of generative AI in educationGroup discussion: How generative AI impacts teaching and learning
2Programming Basics (Python Introduction) - ILearn Python syntax and basic toolsHands-on: Write basic data processing scripts
3Programming Basics (Python Introduction) - IIMaster data reading, manipulation, and basic computationsPractical: Conduct simple analysis on educational data
4Fundamentals of Data MiningUnderstand data mining processes and applications in educationDesign activity: Conduct preliminary analysis of classroom data
5Data Cleaning and PreprocessingLearn techniques for cleaning and organizing educational dataPractical: Clean a dataset of student learning behaviors
6Generative AI Techniques (ChatGPT, DALL-E, etc.)Explore theoretical and practical aspects of generative AI technologiesExperiment: Generate teaching content using ChatGPT
7Data Visualization for EducationMaster visualization tools for presenting data insightsPractical: Create student performance charts using Matplotlib
8Midterm ReportReview progress and present preliminary findingsPresentation: Initial ideas for AI applications in education
9Machine Learning and Learning Data Analysis TopicsExplore machine learning models in educational data analysisPractical: Use basic models to analyze learning data
10Educational Data Mining Techniques (Behavioral Analysis)Learn sequence analysis and its applicationsHands-on: Analyze student learning behavior patterns
11Practical Applications of Generative AI in Educational Data AnalysisDesign generative AI applications for educational data analysisGroup project: Prototype a generative AI application for education
12Capstone Project Workshop (1)Integrate technical and data mining outcomesTeamwork: Develop an AI-driven educational solution
13Capstone Project Workshop (2)Finalize project design and test the systemHands-on: Refine and test features of the generative AI application
14Challenges and Future DirectionsExplore challenges and future opportunities of generative AI in educationDiscussion: Ethical and policy considerations for generative AI
15Flexible Learning: Workshops, Guest Lectures, or DiscussionsParticipate in academic or industry events (online or offline)Write reflections and share learning insights
16Final Report and ShowcasePresent project outcomes and reflect on learning experiencesFinal presentation and project demonstration

gradMethod.ch:
1.課堂參與 (20％)：討論與實作表現。
2.作業與練習 (30％)：含資料清洗、視覺化與機器學習程式設計實作。
3.期中報告 (20％)：生成式AI教育專題構想與初步成果。
4.期末專題 (30％)：生成式AI教育應用的完整設計與展示。
gradMethod.en:
1.Class Participation (20％): Engagement in discussions and hands-on activities.
2.Assignments and Exercises (30％): Data cleaning, visualization, and machine learning tasks with Python.
3.Midterm Report (20％): Proposal and initial group project.
4.Final Project (30％): Complete design and demonstration of a generative AI educational application.

flexDiscription.ch: 這門課旨在讓學生理解生成式AI與教育資料探勘的理論與實作，並學以致用，解決實際教育問題，實現學術與實務並進。本課程有兩周以實體或線上參與研討會、業師演講或課程實作討論形式進行，旨在擴展學員的實務視野與學術能力。
flexDiscription.en: This course aims to equip participants with the theoretical knowledge and practical skills needed to apply generative AI and educational data mining techniques, fostering innovation in education. Two weeks of the course will adopt a flexible format, involving participation in industry or academic events, such as workshops, guest lectures, or project discussions. These activities aim to broaden participants' practical and academic perspectives.
